alert.note: Alert for Edgecombe; Halifax; Nash (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 12 at 9:09PM EST until January 13 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Raleigh NC has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in North Carolina... Fishing Creek At Enfield affecting Nash, Edgecombe and Halifax Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Fishing Creek at Enfield. * WHEN...From late tonight to tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, Minor flooding begins. Minor overflow occurs on both banks. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 PM EST Friday the stage was 15.9 feet. - Bankfull stage is 14.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 16.0 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm EST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Tue Fishing Creek Enfield 16.0 15.9 Fri 9 pm EST 13.7 8.9 8.6 8.7 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/rah/rivers. The next statement will be issued by Saturday morning at 915 AM EST.
